HTMLTableSectionElement.summary: The HTMLTableSectionElement interface provides special properties and methods (beyond the interface it also has available to it by inheritance) for manipulating the layout and presentation of sections, that is headers, footers and bodies ({{HTMLElement("thead")}}, {{HTMLElement("tfoot")}}, and {{HTMLElement("tbody")}}, respectively) in an HTML table.

remarks.para: -The HTML elements implementing this interface: tfoot, thead, and tbody.

HTMLTableSectionElementInsertRow.summary:
The insertRow() method of the interface inserts a new row
(tr) in the given table sectioning element (thead, tfoot, or
tbody), then returns a reference to this new row.

blockquote.para:
insertRow() inserts the row directly into the
section. The row does not need to be appended separately as would be the case if
had been used to create the new
<tr> element.

HTMLTableSectionElementInsertRow.returns: An that references the new row.

HTMLTableSectionElementCh.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The ch property of the interface does nothing. It reflects the char attribute of the section element.

blockquote.para: This property was designed to participate to the ability to align table cell content on a specific character (typically the decimal point), but was never implemented by browsers.
To achieve such alignment, watch for the support of a string value with the text-align CSS property.

HTMLTableSectionElementChOff.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The chOff property of the interface does nothing. It reflects the charoff attribute of the section element.

blockquote.para: This property was designed to participate in an ability to align table cell content on a specific character (typically the decimal point), but was never implemented by browsers.
To achieve such alignment, watch for the support of a string value with the text-align CSS property.

HTMLTableSectionElementVAlign.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The vAlign property of the interface is a string indicating how to vertically align text in a {{htmlelement("thead")}}, {{htmlelement("tbody")}} or {{htmlelement("tfoot")}} table section. Individual rows and cells can override it.

blockquote.para: This property is deprecated. Use the CSS vertical-align property to horizontally align text in section cells instead.

HTMLTableSectionElementRows.summary: The rows read-only property of the interface returns a live containing the rows in the section. The HTMLCollection is live and is automatically updated when rows are added or removed.

HTMLTableSectionElementAlign.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The align property of the interface is a string indicating how to horizontally align text in a {{htmlelement("thead")}}, {{htmlelement("tbody")}} or {{htmlelement("tfoot")}} table section. Individual rows and cells can override it.

blockquote.para: This property is deprecated, and CSS should be used to align text horizontally in a cell. Use the CSS text-align property, which takes precedence, to horizontally align text in section cells instead.

HTMLTableSectionElementDeleteRow.summary:
The deleteRow() method of the interface removes a
specific row (tr) from a given section.
